analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika sa uttara duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sauttaram dhammam paccayā na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
